website_summaries.verdict: An attractive option that offers a built-in recliner, although it may be too small for some.
pros: This is a comfortable, well-constructed option that fits well in small spaces
cons: Chair is on the small side
Recliner is short, which may be a deal-breaker for taller buyers

customer_reviews.title: Very nice chair.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together. I took longer to remove from the box that to assemble. This chair is very comfortable and looks good. Overall very satisfied with this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Sal O

customer_reviews.title: club chairs
customer_reviews.text: low profile, fits easily into smaller room or space. Recliner feature is very stiff. I bought the chairs for my elderly father's room, but he could not operate the release to use the recliner. the fabric is NOT stain resistant, so you should treat it the minute you assemble the chairs. the light grey color is attractive but shows every spot. I think the chairs are an incredible value for the money. (spray your mechanisms with WD40 and stain guard the fabric)
customer_reviews.author: DLW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my living room.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these chairs are absolutely amazing. They are not big bulky chairs but are comfortable enough to lounge in. My husband put them together fairly quick with no hassle. I absolutely love them and am glad I bought two.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Schrader

customer_reviews.title: Not Leather
customer_reviews.text: Chair is identified as "leather" in the title but as soon as I saw, felt and smelled it,I knew it was not leather. The tag on the chair clearly states "polyurethane." Shame on you Amazon for not holding your vendors accountable. The identical chair is sold by numerous others for considerably less ($40) and they call it what it really is, plastic. I was hoping that I was paying more for a product with more durability. Thinking of keeping it b/c my elderly terminally ill mother needs something comfortable to sit in, but I feel, and I was, cheated.
customer_reviews.author: skileslie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. No regrets.
customer_reviews.text: This chair is beautiful! The pictures are very darn close but it's much prettier actually. It's comfortable and the leather is very nice. I think it will wear well. My son in 6" and he thinks it's very comfortable as well. I love the fact that even though it's a recliner it doesn't look like one and the color is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Eve R

customer_reviews.title: Good chioice,
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'7 223 lbs This replaced a huge over stuffed recliner. Yes it is a mall and tighter fit.... Once I placed a pillow on the back, so I fit better, reclining is easier.. If only it didn't slide back against the wall when I get out chair and closing\ foot rest slides the chair back to the wall. I watch TV 24x7 and it is fine. .Next time I would buy a similar one with a handle control.. It freed up space in the LR; It is a keeper :)
customer_reviews.author: MrDave

customer_reviews.title: Good recliner for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Finally I found this compact good-looking reclining chair. There was one spot that upholstery work being very messed up, and it was front side of the chair, but luckily I could fix it myself. Other than that, I totally like this chair. Very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: 808ks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband absolutely love his chair. It's very sleek and go well in our home.
customer_reviews.author: lakeisha muniz

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: The chair arrived about a week late (but the seller was awesome in resolving). It is just as pictured! I am 5'3" and when reclined, it supports halfway up my head. My husband is 6'1", and it doesn't fully support his head - but he thinks it's really comfortable. It was easy to put together - took both of us about 5 minutes. The color is a light cream color, so I think I'll Scotch Guard it at some point. It reclines easily and is a firm seat. We may get another one if the price drops back down to the original price! Fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: Moonlyn

customer_reviews.title: This recliner has small proportions.
customer_reviews.text: This recliner is meant for small spaces only. I bought it as a reading chair for our bedroom but our king size bed and nightstands dwarf it, so it looks silly. It is low to the ground, with a narrow back and narrow arms. With that said, it is fine in comfort, had nice style and function, especially for the price! It fits me well at 5'3" but my 6'1" husband will never use it. Not a 'I can't wait to curl up and read' piece of furniture, but nice for small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair, but just so-so as a recliner
customer_reviews.text: As a chair, it's great. As a recliner, it's just ok. I was hoping to avoid a big poofy recliner and gave this a try, but because it's so small the back only goes up to my neck and doesn't cradle my head (I'm 5'3"). I found that if I wanted to sit for a while and read, I had trouble finding a position that made my head feel supported. That said - I kept the chair. I ended up buying a different recliner (poofier), but kept this as a chair because I do like the style and look of it as a club chair.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Spice

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair fits but manufacture “screwed” up.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a pretty wide girl, short but I have big hips and It took me so long to find and order a chair because of reviews saying they were too narrow, I was scared I’d have a chair I couldn’t fit in, but I fit in this one comfortably and that’s saying a lot. Love the chair but giving 4 stars because the makers of the chair screwed in one of the back support slides upside down... DOUBLE CHECK YOUR CHAIRS BEFORE YOU BOX THEM. Besides me having trouble sliding the back support on then having to unscrew that and fix what should’nt have been a problem in the first place the chair is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive Easy Push-Back Recliner for Post-Surgery
customer_reviews.text: I had low expectations but wanted a quick recliner after my shoulder surgery. I get so many compliments on this stylish little chair! I’m 5’3” and hubby is 6’ and we both decline fine, more comfortable for me. It pushes back so easy and no handle so it was super easy after my surgery. I slept in it often. I plan to buy a second one because it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Katina73

customer_reviews.title: Great chair, not soft, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before I got this so I was happy it fits in my bedroom (not a very large chair) and its hard. I have a butt support pillow and a lumbar support (about $15 each) and I can sit on this thing for several hours (even fall asleep.) My husband is 6'2 and he likes it. I wanted a smaller narrow chair to fit on the side of my bedroom. Its not as comfy or wide as a customary recliner. Note my bed sits pretty high, the chair may look a little low but I would say its average height. Fits my needs well.
customer_reviews.author: shan

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair with excellent padding
customer_reviews.text: I bought the orange color. Good recliner. excellent padding and extremely comfortable. They use bonded-leather, which is recycle leather glue on canvas fabric. Still very good as compare to vinyl. At decline position is little difficult to watch TV, so we add some head cushion on top of the headrest. Not a big deal. I like it a lot. It is my TV watching chair now.
customer_reviews.author: CWL

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair!
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair so much I ended up buying two! I wanted a nice looking arm chair, but my husband was insisting on a recliner, so this was the compromise. They are beautiful chairs, and very comfortable. My husband is over 6 ft tall, and he fits comfortably in these chairs, even reclined. As a side note, these are also standing up very well to our naughty kitty clawing on the side of the chairs. I will be purchasing another one for another room in our house!
customer_reviews.author: TLo23

customer_reviews.title: So far I'm pleased with this recliner
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm pleased with this recliner. Pretty comfortable. My brother was ill and slept in all night. For the price it's a decent piece of furniture. My brother-in-law is 6"3 and he said it was a comfortable little chair. Just a added bit of info for those of you who are concerned about comfort if your tall. As far as weight I believe it will while 200lbs maybe a bit more comfortably if used sparingly.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: For the price = great. Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Sitting and reclining on this right now as I write this review. I was looking at something more as an accent chair and for guests but ended up using it myself as my primary chair. I never sit on the couch anymore other than for naps when I want to lay flat even though this chair has the ability to recline so that you are horizontal. For the price = great. Comfy, functional, and good looking. Easy to assemble - screw in the four legs and snap in the back piece, that's all. Because this is a light color, I applied scotchgard to it in case of spills etc. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: nope

customer_reviews.title: Baught 2 to replace my love seat sofa!
customer_reviews.text: I live in a small studio in downtown San Francisco where saving space is NECESSARY. I bought two of these to replace a love seat sofa and I still have space to spare. This think this chair is fairly comfortable and was a great decision to make!
customer_reviews.author: Urban Living

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Fits my small between. The right price. Easy to assemble. Too small for a person much bigger than me (I'm 5'ft 8).
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: The grey color will go with ant decor and its as comfortable as any chair I own
customer_reviews.text: The chair was perfect. It fit perfect in the corner of my bedroom where Ibwanted it. I sprayed with scotch guard and I use it every evening. I watch my own TV at night and really don’t want to lay in bed so this works perfect. Don’t even think twice. Go ahead and order. It’s very east to assemble and is really comfortable for the price
customer_reviews.author: prfj

customer_reviews.title: Good looking medium size recliners
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these chairs for my family room and the only issue was they arrived 3 days apart. They are a nice size, not too large, not too small. A bit small for my average sized husband to comfortably recline but fine for me at 5"7. Full size recliners would not fit in my space so these were a great compromise rather than getting just plain chairs. The quality is good, they look really nice and they were easy to assemble by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these cool modern hairs but starting to look worn after 2 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: I love these cute modern chairs! I was so worried about ordering online. They came in 2 days and I figured I could take them to kholes to return if I hated them! But I love them!! I love the scale of them as they fit so nice in a smallish space. The recline mechanism works smoothly too. Color is as shown online. Ok I’ve had these chairs for a few weeks and I agree with other reviewers that they probably won’t last too long. The cushions are just starting to look a little crooked!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: ... about purchasing a chair from online but I am glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about purchasing a chair from online but I am glad I did. I was prepping my condo to sell and needed something modern that would not take up a lot of room. My husband said it was super simple to put together and looks amazing in my living room! My older 20 year old son loves sitting in this chair with his computer doing his homework! GREAT CHAIR.
customer_reviews.author: karrie walters

customer_reviews.title: Small and functional
customer_reviews.text: The color and product look exactly as described. This is great for the living room in my moms "in law" suite at our house. Its functional, yet small enough to not take up a lot of space. My only tiny dislike is that you can not recline the footrest without reclining the back of the chair a good bit, however, this doesn't seem to bother my mother.
customer_reviews.author: Cory G.

customer_reviews.title: We bought two of these recliners for our living room about 4 months ago and I love them! We have a pretty small living room ...
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant buying furniture off of amazon but I don't regret it! We bought two of these recliners for our living room about 4 months ago and I love them! We have a pretty small living room and I really wanted two recliners; these fit in perfectly and don't take too much space. We've had no problems with them so far.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Burnt orange beauty.
customer_reviews.text: This chair looks really nice in my living room. Modern lines. LOVE the color. Easy to assemble. A bit hard to recline for someone who doesn't have much strength, but good enough for me and my teens.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle E. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pets
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for pets. Won't absorb odors, easy to clean. Not great for someone who's very tall or very large but average size people can fit fine. Much more comfortable than it seems and such an unbelievable price! Easy to assemble as well. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lady of the Flies

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased
customer_reviews.text: Nice size for a small apt. Comfortable. Not very wide but wide enough for me and I am tall and wear sz 22. Seat has nice amt of cushion and back is at a very slight recline when in non-recliner mode. Fabric is comfortable. I figured out how to put together myself, and I typically can't find my way out of a paper bag. Color was as expected. Not too heavy upon delivery. I would definitely order again. I don't know how long it can be expected to last with wear and tear, but it's sturdy enough for the price it cost.
customer_reviews.author: MNGyrl

customer_reviews.title: Great for small living room!
customer_reviews.text: Great!!! SO EASY to assemble, took about 10 minutes and I was 7 months pregnant with twins. Exactly what I expected, small chair. I purchased so I may recline back with my newborn twins. I'm 5'1 so works great for me as a recliner. My boyfriend is 6'1 and sits in the chair as well without the recline. Great chair at a great price for our small living space.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great looking chair but not meant for every day use. It’s easy to assemble and it’s pretty comfy but after a while it gives out. The first one we had “bottomed out” after a year so for the style and price we bought a second one to replace the first. The second one, the one side is beginning to detach. If it’s for an accent piece then go for it but if you need a chair to use then pass.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these now! I bought the original for my husband to watch football in because he wanted a recliner and I wanted something that didn't look like a recliner! He says it's very comfortable. It's getting a bit fuzzy from him sitting in it, so I don't think it'll be something that will last more than a few years. On the other hand, very inexpensive, ships quickly, easy to put together and look very nice.
customer_reviews.author: F.E. ArlissTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase..
customer_reviews.text: I like the modern flavor this chair adds to my living room, which was my primary reason to purchase. The color is definitely on point! As far as comfort, no, for me. It’s not uncomfortable, tho I did fall asleep in it without being reclined. But when reclined, it is more comfortable. But like I said I didn’t buy it for comfort and I don’t regret it either. I do recommend this chair for my reasons I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Precious

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair! We recently moved and doubled our square footage. This is the perfect piece for my reading area! I don't use it for reclining everyday so if that's what you're looking for, I would invest in something else. However, the fabric and body of the chair has held up well with two little ones, two dogs who probably sleep on this while I'm at work, and multiple holiday parties! Assembly took me less than 5 minutes. If you want an affordable but pretty and well-structured piece, buy this!
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: It works great in small spaces and is very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when I ordered this at $189, but I am very impressed with the quality and modern appearance of this recliner! It works great in small spaces and is very comfortable :)
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Just alright
customer_reviews.text: This chair kind ofI reminds me of an office waiting space... It's alright but definitely looks generic & lacks character. I have the light gray & it shows everything. Every little spill, even water, dog hair, husband hair, fabric pills from rubbing etc. I like sitting on it so it serves its purpose, it's just not nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Hill

customer_reviews.title: Super easy assembly!
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited about this chair. Initially I was intimidated by the heavy packaging and thought it would be too heavy to carry upstairs. After unpacking it in the living room I was easily able to get it upstairs. Once you unpack it you have a package with 4 peg legs, the base of the unit, and the back of the unit. The four legs easily screw in and the back slides into slots that are on the base. It literally took 5 minutes to assemble. After testing it the reclining function works well so I am definitely looking forward to curling up with a book!
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: and it is easy for her to recline in even though it has ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this recliner as a gift for my mom. She loves it and uses it daily, and it is easy for her to recline in even though it has to be manually adjusted. She has been known to take long naps in this chair. The size is just perfect for her room. The assembly was so easy. The hardest part was screwing in the legs - Not! I would definitely recommend this recliner to anyone who wants comfort without the bulkines of most modern day recliners.
customer_reviews.author: Annette JB

customer_reviews.title: Nice for chair not for reclining
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to sit in harder than the dickens to get in reclining position. Even the men in the family struggled and one is 230.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Rose

customer_reviews.title: Comfy chair
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an “emergency chair” for a relative who had hip surgery. It was easy to assemble and worked for her small space. Wouldn’t know it was bought online, super comfy modern look. Definitely not a cheap looking chair. Her only complaint was it was a bit deep for her legs ., though fit me great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Orange chair for smaller people
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE my new bright orange chair. I have it in my office room. It took about 3 minutes to get it out of the box and assembled-simply place the back part onto the bottom part and you are done. I am a smaller woman -5 "4"- and on the petite side, and this fits me perfectly. I would not recommend it for a larger person-man or woman- because it is a smaller chair.It looks gorgeous for $200.00 -actually like a much more expensive chair. The leather is very comfortable. For the fairly minimal use it will get in my office, I could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Bellafelice

customer_reviews.title: 2 Orange Chairs
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two chairs. One of them has a scar on the right arm. I like them but hate that one of them is a scratch. The two chairs are also made differently. One seat has the seam showing where the cushotwas sewn together. The other chair has the seam hidden.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 chairs! Super easy to assemble (maybe 10 minutes each). The cushions are a little stiff at first but once you sit on them for a while they get more comfortable. I am very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Andreina Santiago Santana

customer_reviews.title: AMAZON IS HORRIBLE WHEN THERE IS A PROBLEM!!!
customer_reviews.text: ARRIVED WITH NO LEGS AND AMAZON REFUSED ANY SOLUTIONS.REPEATEDLY TOLD ME WHAT I COULD DO,CONTACT THE MANUFACTURER ON GOOGLE!!!
customer_reviews.author: mary mercer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Pretty comfortable for short people like me. I have to use alot of force to keep it completely reclines. The gap in the foot rest when reclined is a little annoying. Wish it came in darker colors - have to keep it covered with a sheet to keep it from getting dirty.
customer_reviews.author: ozzie klein

customer_reviews.title: it looked nice and was easy to put together and to take ...
customer_reviews.text: The seat itself is way too long. It was sent back because of that. Otherwise, it looked nice and was easy to put together and to take apart to put back in the box.
customer_reviews.author: agoodnight

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what it is!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great chair for a small space. It is small and exactly what you think a chair that’s $179 dollars is. Works great for what we needed. Don’t expect the comfort of a lazy boy but it’s a fabulous accent chair that reclines. We like it!
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 chairs. Super easy to assemble. The cushion itself if pretty rough to sit on. I'm sure it will soften up over time. I'm 5'6. If I sit against the back, I have no head support. So, reclining is pointless for me. My wife is 5'1 and it works for her. The general appearance is okay for $135 a chair. I just listed them for sale on Facebook and am just gonna take a hit selling them. Returns are $36 per chair. Unless you're shorter than me, I would keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Chancellor

customer_reviews.title: This can't be that easy
customer_reviews.text: By far the easiest assembly out of anything I have ever purchased. No tools necessary, I bought two of these chairs and we were sitting in them within 10 minutes after unboxing. They fully recline and fit me and my husband just perfect, we are both on the shorter side. Might not be the best option for anyone over 5"8'. They are the perfect finishing addition to my living room. I will post pictures to come.
customer_reviews.author: A Wesson

customer_reviews.title: This is an incredible deal
customer_reviews.text: I love my new chairs! I bought 2 used but in like new condition. I didn’t notice any damage. Hey were a breeze to put together. I’m 6’ and sit comfortably in these chairs. My 6’8 father even enjoyed them. Are they a family heirloom? No. But, at THIS price point it cannot be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Tall Lex

customer_reviews.title: Great chair, not a big bulky chair
customer_reviews.text: Cute chair, very easy to put together. Cushion on seat is solid and doesn’t seem like it will flatten easily. I am 5 ft 6 and the chair is fine for me when reclined, not a great fit for a family member that is 5 ft 10 head hangs over back of seat. Great price for a cute chair , delivery was very fast !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrific buy
customer_reviews.text: Was t quite sure how good or sturdy this chair would be but wow. EASY to put together. Comfortable and reclines very well and to not quite flat. Glad I bought!
customer_reviews.author: Joan Quirk

customer_reviews.title: Cute and great for a corner hook
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together and great for small spaces. The grey is a very nice color not to light but a light color still. It does smell like a factory but a little Febreze and all better. The seat part is a little longer then I expected and it doesn’t sit up as much as I would like but for the money and size it’s great! I simply just put a little throw pillow in for me to use and it’s prefect!!! I would recommend this chair!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair! I was surprised at the quality for the price. Easy to put together in 2 steps (I did it alone) and arrived quickly. I highly recommend it, unless you’re a large person. It’s petite, but perfect for the little corner I put it in.
customer_reviews.author: Deedle Wanda

customer_reviews.title: This chair was incredibly easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This chair was incredibly easy to assemble! Item is exactly as described and color was accurate. It is easy to recline and stays put wherever it is stopped. I'm so glad I purchased this chair. It looks expensive and well-made.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two chairs. At first the wrong items were sent, but Amazon made getting the right items relatively easy. One of the chairs I received is great. The other appears to be a dud. The assembly that the back piece connects to is set too far back at an angle, making the chair unusable. It can't be moved either, even with tools. Good chairs, just hope you don't get a defective one.
customer_reviews.author: Large James

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, style and price.
customer_reviews.text: Second one I purchased. Compact size and good style. Very comfortable. Better look than huge overstuffed recliners. Great color adds zest to the room.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great chair for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair instead of a glider for my daughters nursery. It’s a great chair for a reasonable price. It’s not super big but at 5’3” I have plenty of room to cuddle up in it. Declining motion is smooth and so far no problems!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Alcala

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: Not good for tall people as a recliner anyway and doesn't stay in the reclined position very well but looks nice in my room and I love the color (orange). We just use it as a regular chair. Probably wouldn't buy it again though :(
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Varden Straffin

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous bedroom chair
customer_reviews.text: This chair is perfect for a small space. I have in my medium size bedroom next to my bed. My little dog and I can sit it comfortably. I am 5'5" tall and fit works for me. Easy to install and design is fab.
customer_reviews.author: JudiGwtw

customer_reviews.title: Happy Shopper
customer_reviews.text: For over a year, I was eyeing up these chairs and reading all the reviews. My living room is not large so I needed chairs that will fit and not make the room look congested. I am so happy with my purchase and the product. It didn't take my partner a long time to set them up either. The chairs look great and they are very comfortable. I was actually shocked at how far back the chair actually reclined, because of some of the reviews. They will serve its purpose for a few years.
customer_reviews.author: La Tonya

customer_reviews.title: so compact and confortable
customer_reviews.text: Is so awesome after I order the chair I try to cancel the order and was already shipped. Good I couldn't cancel I am so happy with my purchase. I was under the impression that was too big for the space I have in the bed room, was perfect the color and material are number one. Is unbelievable comfortable . Get it I'm pretty sure you will enjoy !!
customer_reviews.author: Tita

customer_reviews.title: Really nice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair for my son for his birthday, and he loves it! Beautiful color. Very comfortable. Really easy to assemble. Nice quality. Very, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Goes with Everything
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price! They are holding up and everyone likes them. They are small and cozy, so they aren't for everyone, but we like the material and think they were a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: J. Idleman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Chair and Quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the look and feel of the leather is amazing. The comfort and workmanship looks and feels great. It's a solid heavy chair, not cheap... I'm impressed with this product and price point...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wish I could had this in cloth as the ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could had this in cloth as the leather is rather cheap looking and feeling. This chair was for a small man cave. I would not buy this to sit in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie

customer_reviews.title: The perfect living room chair
customer_reviews.text: My hubby purchased this recliner for me. I love the contemporary style & it's quite comfortable. I like being able to adjust to the reclining position without having to strughle with a side handle. The over the top plus is that it's actually real leather. It arrived in perfect condition & yep I'd whole heartedly recommend this lovely leather addition to any room.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Hargett

customer_reviews.title: I would buy another, decent chair for $
customer_reviews.text: Decent chair for the money. Fits nicely in my study, not real leather, but, doesn’t feel like cheap pleather. Pretty comfortable too, more of an occasional / Art Deco chair.
customer_reviews.author: Jones boy

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Not bad, actually quite comfy. I’m not a large person, however, and bigger, taller people may not find this chair to their liking. My only complaint is the full stretched out position will not remain open.
customer_reviews.author: A. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a smaller space in a bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a smaller space in a bedroom. Very firm and comfortable. I am 4'11" and my husband is 6'1" and the chair works for both of us. Great orange color with easy assembly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Space
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these chairs! We were looking for some accent chairs and my husband really wanted recliners. I was hesitant at first, as recliners tend to take up too much space but decided to give these a try and they are perfect and exactly what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: So glad that I did!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been shopping for chairs for months now....I didn’t want to spend too much but I was afraid I’d get crappy chairs if I bought a little cheaper. After reading other reviews, I finally decided to buy these and I’m so glad that I did. They look fantastic....not too big yet substantial enough for the space I needed filling. They were extremely easy to assemble, and exactly what I wanted!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie White

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Vibrant
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought chair for my hubby but a tad smaller than I expected so claimed it as my own. Chair looks fabulous in my living room and is made really well and eventhough i got a great deal price wise you would never know by looking at it.
customer_reviews.author: kjcjtj

customer_reviews.title: Arms are low had a little one climb and take a nose dive.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, no tools needed light weight enough to manuver, color was perfect , and roomy not bulky. Comfort is fine maybe a head pillow and your golden. First recliner. I bought money well spent. Should last unless you are rough with it.
customer_reviews.author: irma sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size chair for my 70YO mom
customer_reviews.text: Chair was the perfect size for my 70YO, mom. The chair was was easily & quickly put together in under 5 minutes...it took me longer to carry the chair upstairs than putting it together. Chair is exactly as described.....make sure you zoom in on the photos on Amazon as it it is fabric..picture made it look more micro-fiber...
customer_reviews.author: DANNY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my small apartment!
customer_reviews.text: This chair came quickly and shipped without any defects, very easy to assemble (took about 10 minutes). It is on the small side, I'm 5'4" so its perfect for me and my small living room. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Hollyleilani

customer_reviews.title: For the money this is a great chair, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: For the money this is a great chair, easy to assemble, compact. I could have made a more expensive purchase and received a more comfy, chair but I couldnt bring myself to spent $500.00. So I'll just buy a comfy pillow and I'm happy. But this chair for the money is a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Fran Passariello

customer_reviews.title: Black Recliner for ME + MY POM!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the Black Recliner on a Saturday and when I came home from work on Friday, it was sitting at my front door. I struggled a bit to get it into my apt, since I had no help and it was heavy...but after I manged to get in thru the door, it literally took me 10 minutes to unpack it, put the 4 legs on on and place the back on. I'm a female that is 5'7" of average weight and it fits me and my doggie perfect!! VERY HAPPY SO FAR...
customer_reviews.author: cynders

customer_reviews.title: Actually very nice, works well in our tv/sitting room
customer_reviews.text: Actually very nice, works well in our tv/sitting room. I looked at a lot of recliners and they were either WAY too expensive or too bulky. we wanted recliners for a small space that are low profile and these fit the bill. Only gave 4 stars because you can tell they are a little flimsy - time will tell. And one of the two I purchased didn't quite "click" together in assembly too well, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Palm Springs Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Almost a great chair.
customer_reviews.text: The seat cushion is really comfortable but there is no lumbar support and very little padding on the back or the arms of the chair. If you place a pillow behind you when you're sitting it helps since the seat is deep. The fabric is unforgiving but the arm seat height while sitting feels good on the shoulders. It's not a chair to sit in for longer than a movie.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice recliner chair
customer_reviews.text: Very nice recliner chair. Easy to assemble in minutes. Only thing is when it's reclined all the way back it's a tad hard to get it to stay reclined. It tends to want to come forward some as you relax. Good buy for the $ otherwise
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal Value
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Not a giant chaid, but I have room to spare on both sides (I'm a size 14). The color is vibrant and it feels quite sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amy R.

customer_reviews.title: love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: delivered in two days., really fast. it is exactly as shown. perfect for bedroom., pretty fabric, size is great., and really comfy. couldn't be more pleased with the whole experience.
customer_reviews.author: gg

customer_reviews.title: Like it very much.
customer_reviews.text: Love it-- I am short though... and It does not easily 'fully' recline -- nor does it stay that way without occasional physical effort. Do not really care though as it is here and I'm sitting on it a lot. It's comfortable, sturdy-- seems well made -- was not cheep and does not feel or look cheep.
customer_reviews.author: Florida me

customer_reviews.title: Hard to recline
customer_reviews.text: Bought this chair for my mom, but it seems to be a little hard to push it back to recline, it's a nice chair, but I might need to adjust the spring or something to make it easier for her to recline.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle T

customer_reviews.title: Low cost. Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Some people reported they received theirs damaged. I guess it happens from time to time. Mine came perfectly packaged, took about 10 minutes per chair to set up. Its a steal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy my chair
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy my chair! It goes well with my Bassette sofa. I was concern that the color would be too light, but it is perfect. Easy to assemble... Thanks for reading.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Ellerbe

customer_reviews.title: Mom loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my mom who lives in a small apartment. She wanted a recliner but most are too bulky. This one is perfect and she loves it. It is easy to put together. I own the beige one and I love mine as well.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Z

customer_reviews.title: I love mine!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s super cute!! It’s not a big, bulky recliner. It’s very stylish. I have one for my home office (I plan to buy another one). I sit on it for conference calls and it’s super comfy. My kids will read in the chair while I’m working. Super easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Really love the appearance in my office. I order the grey. It's comfortable and easy to assemble without your hubby's help. :)
customer_reviews.author: T. W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small areas.
customer_reviews.text: Looooove it! I live in a small department with a tiny living room. I bought 2 chairs and not only pair perfectly with my sofa but fits like a glove in my space area. Super comfy and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for a small area !!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have a small area in our living room and I wanted another seat. We liked what we saw in the picture and description, we would take a chance. It is perfect! It is just the right size, looks great and we have another seat !!
customer_reviews.author: Yankee shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great little chair
customer_reviews.text: The chair is not as posh as I am used to but it fits into the space well, and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: judy graham

customer_reviews.title: Great little chair...
customer_reviews.text: I use it for everyday to watch tv... the other one lasted me over 5 years of literally great comfort even with my two grandsons hanging on it and climbing on it too! Great for the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda H Mease

customer_reviews.title: This recliner is super cute and what I was looking for when redecorating ...
customer_reviews.text: This recliner is super cute and what I was looking for when redecorating our family room. The price was right, easy to put together. The only reason I'm giving 4 stars is because the back only goes to your shoulders, so you have to hold your head up. You can't really relax and recline in it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I practically live in this chair. I bought it for my nursery to breast feed in and for the price you can not beat it. I was a bit hesitant about if it was wide enough but it’s perfect for my Netflix and chill with my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Maddox

customer_reviews.title: Great comfy space saver!
customer_reviews.text: I have a fairly small office at work and needed a nice comfortable recliner and this was perfect! Its so soft to sit on, very comfy and a great space saver!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie Cava

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's good for the price. Nice size does not overwhelm the room like the more expensive recliners.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy and a perfect fit for my small studio apartment
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy and a perfect fit for my small studio apartment. The color is so classic. My one issue is how easily it absorbs stains. Otherwise, very nice and elegant chair. The recline is the best part! It was also SUPER simple to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Willameana

customer_reviews.title: Delightful reading
customer_reviews.text: Just what I had in mind for reading corner in my bedroom. Nice and comfy. Great smaller recliner!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

product_meta.title: Christopher Knight Home Davis Leather Recliner Club Chair, Black
product_meta.description: Style:Leather Recliner Club Chair| Color:BlackRelax in style with this Davis recliner club chair featuring a solid frame and sturdy feet for added stability and strength. This comfortable reclining chair is great for small spaces and functions as a great place to take a nap or read a book.
feature_bullets: Both a foot extension as well as reclining back functions
Solid frame and sturdy feet for added stability and strength
Seat dimensions: 17.25 Inch high x 20 Inch wide x 22.25 Inch deep

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars497 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
